transArray.content: A family of three adults lives in a duplex room with twin beds downstairs. There is a single bed upstairs. Each floor has its own bathroom and TV. The overall environment of the hotel is very good. The location is very good. Just around the corner from Qianmen Street is Tiananmen Square. There is also the hotel's front desk and service staff The attitude is very good and warm, and I will choose this place next time I come to Beijing
